app.title: It Looks Legit
app.subtitle: ...or is it?
app.researchSubtitle: Perform research on topics and questions
app.defineSubtitle: Type a term to get a quick explanation
app.inputPlaceholder: Paste your news article, social media post, or claim here to fact-check... You can also drag & drop or paste images directly here!
app.researchPlaceholder: Enter your research question or topic here... e.g., 'What are the benefits of renewable energy?' or 'How does AI impact healthcare?'
app.definePlaceholder: Type a term or concept to explain...
app.infoText: Our AI analyzes claims against reliable sources and provides detailed verification reports

workspace.aiWelcome: Hello! I'm your AI assistant. How can I help you with your workspace today?

suggestions.createDocument: Help me create a new document

aiResponses.help: I'm here to help you organize and analyze your workspace content.
aiResponses.analyze: I can help you analyze the research and fact-check results in your workspace.
aiResponses.create: I can help you create documents, organize information, and structure your findings.
aiResponses.research: I can assist with research tasks and help you find reliable sources.
aiResponses.factCheck: I'll help you fact-check claims and analyze their credibility.

mode.factCheckDescription: Verify the accuracy of specific claims with evidence-based analysis (2-4 minutes est.)
mode.researchDescription: Get comprehensive research reports on topics and questions (3-5 minutes est.)
mode.defineDescription: Quickly explain a term or concept in one step (few seconds).
